boardgame.description: A simplified version of the 3rd Editon/3.5 Dungeons and Dragons roleplaying game, designed as an introduction to roleplaying, but is - in essence - a boardgame not unlike HeroQuest._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Includes 16 pre-painted miniatures from the D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp;D Miniatures range (but aren't randomized - each box includes the same 16 miniatures), and the rules are very similar to this game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Also listed on RPGGeek as Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons Basic Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;amp; Dragons Starter Sets:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;2nd Edition: The New Easy to Master Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons and Introduction to Advanced Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;3rd Edition/3.5 Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Basic Game_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;4th Edition: Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Starter Set_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: It_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s actually Classic D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D game produced by TSR with 6 plastic character minis. Shipping within Europe: 13 euros.

Unplayed 2004 Basic game. Shrinkwrap has been removed, but all figures and dice are still in the original sealed packages. Paper and cardboard components are straight and crisp. Includes 16 painted figures, 7 dice, and advanced rule booklet. Box has virtually no damage or shelfwear.
Brand New in Shrink Wrap. Picked it up on sale and decided I have no need for it.

D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D Basic Game boxed set. Used once to introduce a friend to the game. Everything included. Mint condition. No missing pieces or instructions. Bonus: includes extra dice not originally included in box, so you don_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t have to share one d20.

Wizards of the Coast (WOC 95391) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D BASIC GAME (REVISED EDITION) Based on extensive testing and feedback, the popular Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons Basic Game has been completly redesigned to be an even better entry point for new players. This new version makes it easy to start playing D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D immediately. It contains everything needed for the complete D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D experience, including a complete set of dice, a gameboard, a rulebook for each player and the DM featuring streamlined rules drawn straight from the Dungeons _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Dragons core rulebooks, and 12 miniatures taken from the popular D_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;D Miniatures line.
opened and looked at, all parts included (version with 16 miniatures) and in good shape

2006 edition (Blue Dragon on cover) I have inventoried, and this seems to be almost complete, though I can_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;t find a listing of the tiles that seems right. All dice, instructions, and figures are present. Everything is in excellent condition! Buyer pays actual shipping cost. If you would like a shipping quote before purchasing, please contact me.
